text: Joy Behar is an American actress, comedian and writer. She co-hosts the television program The View on ABC. Behar has been in a number of movies and other television programs. She currently hosts The Joy Behar Show. She was born October 7, 1942. ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:American voice actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:Writers from New York City Category:Television talk show hosts
title: Joy Behar
